title: 820-3332-A Boots and runs great. Screen suddenly goes of. No backlight, no picture.
message:
Like the subject says. Board has reported liquid (coffee) damage although I can't see anything.

Machine appears to still be running ok. HDMI port appears to be damaged so can't test external screen.

Thinking I'll start by investigating SMC_LID signal?

title: 820-3332-A Boots and runs great. Screen suddenly goes of. No backlight, no picture.
message: Check external with thunderbolt to VGA adapter. Or clean it up and hope Apple will accept it under the GPU recall.

title: 820-3332-A Boots and runs great. Screen suddenly goes of. No backlight, no picture.
message:
Thanks.
Couldn't get an external screen to show a picture despite it detecting it was plugged in.

Cleaned up and returning under the recall program.
